Lyrics: Wie gern wär ich bei dir!
Poetic Translation: With you I want to be!

Direct Translation: See translation at Choral Public Domain Library.
Poetic Translation: But there are two deep waters
But there are two deep waters

Lyrics: Hoff, Zeit wird es wohl enden,
Poetic Translation: I hope time ends our sorrow;
I hope our luck is fine
